Text: December FOM Estimates for New PowerThanksgiving David
New Power November FOM Final Editionis the revised New Power FOM volumes for November CMD increased by mmbtu and AGL Sonat and Transco decreased by mmbtu Let me know if you have any questions David

Re Daily volumes for and it is again David Forwarded by Dave ScottHOUEES on AM Dave Scott PM To Chris CT cc Subject Re Daily volumes for and I show the following fixed price deals between ENA and CES that were assigned to New Power Negative dollar amounts based on the volumes of the st shown below were on the August invoice which I interpreted to be where ENA was buying the gas back at Index I assumed all deals should be similarly represented on the invoice David Pipeline ENA Deal MMBtu Tetco M NA TCO NA Transco Z NA Tetco M NC Transco Z NA Sonat NA Tenn La NA TCO NC CGT Rayne NA MichCon NA MichCon NC Transco Z NC Chris CT PM To Dave ES cc Subject Re Daily volumes for and I will be out tomorrow and I may leave early this afternoon Could you email me the deal numbers for the purchases and sales for the month of August
Daily volumes for and and BGE had intraday changes AGL BGE and COH change for COH actuals are included through David
FInal FOM for are the final FOM volumes for October st that were communicated to ENA schedulers on Friday Pleae call me if you have any questions David
Daily changes for and intraday changes for Only BGE dth decrease and NJN dth decrease change for David

Afterhours and weekend contacts Cc are painfully aware starting October several of the CES New Power utilities will be going to daily requirements Therefore for those of you that handle the upstream scheduling for city gate deliveries to New Power please provide us with the pipelines you schedule your pager number and that of your designated backup if applicable Additionally anytime you know that youll be unavailable please advise us who to contact in your absence Our plan is to send emails each weekday morning directly to schedulers that have changes and then follow up with a Daily Requirements summary which several of you have indicated you do not need to see a copy of If you would prefer a phone call instead of or in addition to the email on mornings that we have changes on your pipelines please advise Please notify us via email anytime you have a contract change that affects us during the week and page us on the weekends Thanks for your help David Scott wk pager AGL BGE MichCon Nipsco NJN WGL Jeffrey Porter wk pager COH CPA CMD CGSCVA
st Revised October FOM Requirementsreview the Comments tab David
Daily Requirements for and Cc day changes today and no changes for tomorrow Ive attached the file to reflect AGL changes over the last couple of days while I was out of the office David
Daily Requirements for and Cc on AGL ETNG For increase Nipsco NGPL by d David

Daily Changes for CES markets Cc a modified version of the Daily Changes spreadsheet youve been receiving from Doug Kinney The new format shows the required volume by date and by meter same as before but now compares that new volume to the original FOM volume for each day of the month as opposed to comparing it to the previous days requested volume Let me know if you have any thoughts comments about this format Again if you dont want on the distribution or know of someone I should add please let me know To date the only changes for September have been behind AGL and those changes are included on the attachment David

Sept FOM Requirements Cc Forwarded by Dave ScottHOUEES on AM Dave Scott AM To FOM Direct cc FOM cc Subject Sept FOM Requirements Hopefully this is the final version for September FOM volumes See the comments dated identifying the changes Call me at if you have questions David
Sept FOM Requirements Cc is the final version for September FOM volumes See the comments dated identifying the changes Call me at if you have questions David

Updated AGL FOM volumeshas posted their September LSR details so attached is the revised FOM numbers Also on TCO COH there were mmbtu shown as separately priced per Doug Kinney that deal is not being assigned to New Power so while the required volume isnt changing the net volume at FOM price goes up by mmbtu I took the to Christina and Scott Ive also attached a preliminary AGL sheet for so you can begin to assign contract numbers David
st Revised September FOM volumes Cc the comments page of the attachment for details of the updates and call me if you have any questions David

September FOM volumes for CESNew Power Cc the September st volume requirements for CESNew Power Please advise if you know of anyone that should be added to the distribution or if you would like to be removed from the distribution David
